name: Battery
tagline: Battery was born of an idea.
description:
Named as Ad Age's Small Agency of the Year in 2015 and 2016, we produce fearless work for really brave clients. Plain and simple.
To form the agency, we brought together a group of top agency creatives, former client side brand marketers and successful entrepreneurs. This unique mix created a nimble and fiercely competitive business mentality which led us to be the #8 fastest growing LA private company in 2016.
Over the past 3 years, we're really proud of the work we've done for such major brands as LEGO, Batman, Mortal Kombat, NBCUniversal, Mike's Hard Lemonade and a few more.
